001
002package com.commercetools.api.models.common;
003
004import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonSubTypes;
005import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonTypeInfo;
006import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.annotation.JsonDeserialize;
007
008/**
009 * generic reference interface
010 * @param <T> the underlying reference type
011 */
012@JsonDeserialize(as = GenericReferenceImpl.class)
013@JsonSubTypes({})
014@JsonTypeInfo(use = JsonTypeInfo.Id.NAME, include = JsonTypeInfo.As.EXISTING_PROPERTY, property = "typeId", defaultImpl = GenericReferenceImpl.class, visible = true)
015public interface GenericReference<T> extends Reference {
016    public T getObj();
017
018    public default GenericReference<T> of(final ReferenceTypeId typeId, final String id, final T obj) {
019        return new GenericReferenceImpl<>(typeId, id, obj);
020    }
021}
